location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter encloses a copy of a petition, dated 19 January 1813, made on behalf from Buxee Khanum, widow of Aga Mahomed Bhebanee (also written as Bebany and Babany elsewhere in the volume), and addressed to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay. The petition regards Buxee Khanum's claim to a portion of her late husband's property. Babington instructs Bruce to use his influence to recover the property and remit the amount to the Residency.
